sentences.en: We'd never accept that someone else can unilaterally violate agreements that we have all signed up to.
sentences.cn: 我们决不会接受别人单方面违反我们签署的协议。

sentences.en: That way, Apple could not unilaterally introduce a code that weakens the iPhone—a user would have to consent to it.
sentences.cn: 这样，苹果就不能单方面引入削弱 iPhone 的代码，而是必须先得到用户的同意才行。

sentences.en: Please talk to them and not take action unilaterally.
sentences.cn: 请他们对话，而不是单方面采取行动。
